ਲਾਡੀ ਦੇ ਲੱਡੂ

Laddi's Laddoos

...Quality Sweets and Chai

About Us ਸਾਡੇ ਬਾਰੇ

Chef Laddi brings the flavours of Hoshiapur to the heart of downtown Vancouver. With a discerning palette perfected over three Indian states and two Canadian provinces, only the freshest and highest quality sweets pass muster. Come taste for yourself!

Contact ਸੰਪਰਕ

712 Granville Street, Vancouver BC

eat@laddisladdoos.ca

(604) 555-0150

Hours of Operationਕਾਰਵਾਈ ਦੇ ਘੰਟੇ

Monday & Tuesday: Closed

Wednesday-Sunday: 3pm-10pm

Menu ਮੀਨੂ

Gujiya ਗੁਜੀਆ

Pastry with sweet nut filling

Besan Barfi ਬੇਸਨ ਬਰਫੀ

Classic sweet and nutty taste

Jalebi ਜਲੇਬੀ

Deep fried North Indian treat

Mysore Pak ਮੈਸੂਰ ਪਾਕ

A rich barfi from Karnataka

Malai Peda ਮਲਾਈ ਪੇਡਾ

Sweet cream laddoo

Laddoo ਲੱਡੂ

Original Punjabi taste
